name: Death Mage
description:
My Entry for the Blackthornprod game jam!

Based on the theme less is more, you are a Death Mage,the closer you are to your death and the less health you have, the more powerful your attacks become but be careful not to ride too close to the line or it could be your end!

Defend your forest keep and protect the Crystals of power from the attack of other creatures in a top down wizard shooter!

***Ran out of time to truly finish the game but it is playable start to end.

***Apologies for no audio. Our sound and music guy had to pull out.

*Known Bug: When killing an enemy that is assigned to a destroyed crystal of power, the game will glitch out and end. This has been fixed since and will be updated after jam.
